snippet.title: Destroy All Humans! – Clone Carnage – Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Tired of playing with yourself all alone? Good news: Clone Carnage, the stand-alone multiplayer mode for Destroy All Humans! is OUT NOW!

Grab a friend for some hot split screen action on your couch or go online for an intense foursome. Dress up in all skins from Destroy All Humans! – if you’re into that. And the best thing? If you pre-order Destroy All Humans! 2 – Reprobed, it’s completely free and available today!

- Links & Info -
Steam: https://thqn.net/dahcc-steam
PlayStation: https://thqn.net/dahcc-playstation
Xbox: https://thqn.net/dahcc-xbox
Website: https://www.destroyallhumansgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/destroy

- Our Socials -
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DAH_Crypto
Facebook: https://facebook.com/destroyallhumansgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic

#DestroyAllHumans #CloneCarnage
